item.title: 探索式慢跑
item.description: The current Red Sea crisis poses significant disruptions to global supply chain resilience. In response, the Middle Corridor, also known as the Trans-Caspian International Transport Route (TITR), is gaining momentum. This route integrates multimodal transport modes, including rail and sea, connecting Chinese and European markets via Central Asia and the South Caucasus1.
